'''Electroculus Resonance Stone''' is a consumable [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[Electroculus|Electroculi]]. It can be created through [[alchemy]] after using the [[Instructions: Electroculus Resonance Stone|instructions]] obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 8 in [[Inazuma]].

{{Transclude|Oculus Resonance Stone|resonance stone intro|section=1}}

==Alchemy==
{{Recipe
|type = Crafting
|Naku Weed = 5
|Sakura Bloom = 5
|Amethyst Lump = 1
|Mora = 500
|sort = Naku Weed;Sakura Bloom;Amethyst Lump;Mora
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|This strange device can resonate with [[Electro]] [[Statues of The Seven]]. Due to this trait, it can detect the presence of [[Electroculi]]. Across the span of endless years, even the most majestic cities and sculptures would be worn down by wind and rain, and even the power of Statues of The Seven would gradually dissipate. But this faded strength would coalesce once more into the [[Oculi]], which call out wordlessly to their Statues.|[[Archive]]}}
